long description: 325 MB Day Data + 325 MB Night Data -- Overage: 4p/10KB
1 GB over 1 weekend -- Validity: 1 weekend (1 Saturday and 1 Sunday within the span of 7 days); Starts from 00:00:00 hours on Saturday and ends on 23:59:59 hours on Sunday)
4 GB over 4 weekends -- Validity: 4 weekends (4 Saturdays & 4 Sundays within the span of 28 days); Starts from 00:00:00 hours on Saturday and ends on 23:59:59 hours on Sunday)
Unlimited upto 3.25 GB -- FUP limit: 40KBPS post 3.25 GB, 20KBPS post 4.25 GB
Unlimited upto 5 GB -- FUP limit: 40KBPS post 5 GB, 20KBPS post 6 GB
Unlimited upto 10 GB -- FUP limit: 40KBPS post 10 GB, 20KBPS post 11 GB
Unlimited upto 12 GB -- FUP limit: 40KBPS post 12 GB, 20KBPS post 13 GB
